title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for g'(x)=f(x)

1 point is earned for considering g''(x)>0

1 point is earned for the answer

g'(x)=f(x), g''(x)=f'(x)

g''(x)>0 when f'(x)>0

This is true for -4<x<0 and 3<x<6.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(x)=f(x)

1 point is earned for considering g''(x)>0

1 point is earned for the answer

g'(x)=f(x), g''(x)=f'(x)

g''(x)>0 when f'(x)>0

This is true for -4<x<0 and 3<x<6.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(x)=f(x)

1 point is earned for considering g''(x)>0

1 point is earned for the answer

g'(x)=f(x), g''(x)=f'(x)

g''(x)>0 when f'(x)>0

This is true for -4<x<0 and 3<x<6.

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(x)=f(x)

1 point is earned for considering g''(x)>0

1 point is earned for the answer

g'(x)=f(x), g''(x)=f'(x)

g''(x)>0 when f'(x)>0

This is true for -4<x<0 and 3<x<6.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(x)=f(x)

1 point is earned for considering g''(x)>0

1 point is earned for the answer

g'(x)=f(x), g''(x)=f'(x)

g''(x)>0 when f'(x)>0

This is true for -4<x<0 and 3<x<6.
